values:
Well I figured that just to throw everyone off I would do an update in here.  Its been flipping forever since I did an update here.  I started doing them on myspace since everyone has myspace and my friends who didn't have lj were bitching about checking here too, so yeah, I am sure that everyone knows this but whatever.


School sucks, but I am almost done, less than 2 weeks, WOAH!!!!

I really want my mp3 player!!!!! Waiting for shipping sucks... I feel like a little kid, I want/need instant gratification, lol, oh well life's a bitch!


moo

Gnome Warrior



Gnomes are strange little things. Fascinated with gadgets and shiny things, gnomes are often plotting and planning - but are pretty smart, despite all the explosions.

As a warrior, you like to take charge of things. You feel that you're an important part of what's happening - and if things turn sour, you like to have a very large weapon on hand that you can use to negotiate.

Find out your real-life WoW race and class at QuizGalaxy.com

Here are a series of promises that really speaks to true friendship:

1. When you are sad - I will help you get drunk and plot revenge against
the sorry bastard who made you sad

2. When you are blue - I will try to dislodge whatever is choking you.

3. When you smile - I will know you finally got laid.

4. When you are scared - I will rag on you about it every chance I get.

5. When you are worried - I will tell you horrible stories about how much
worse it could be and to quit whining.

6. When you are confused - I will use little words.

7. When you are sick - Stay the hell away from me until you are well again.
I don't want whatever you have.

8. When you fall - I will point and laugh at your clumsy ass.

This is my oath...I pledge it till the end, because you are my friend. 
Remember: A good friend will help you move.
A really good friend will help you move a body.
Let me know if I ever need to bring a shovel.

Well I havent really been in the mood to update lately, mainly cause I have been sooo freaking busy!!!!  I started work on friday, and have worked friday, saturday and today.  This is going to be a really stressfull/busy week for me!!! I have tomorrow off, but I have to be at the civic engagement center in the sub like all freaking day to get service hours in for class so I can pass it, UGH!  Then I get to write a 2 page paper on that (that wont take more than like 10 mins, but is still something I have to do) and then I have a study group at 8pm.  Tuesday I have an easy final at 9am, that the Monday night study group is for.  I work 3pm-7pm Tuesday. Then I have Wednesday off, I have to study my ass off for my stats final so I can hopefully get a B in stats, my gpa needs it soooooo bad!!!!!!!! And then on Thursday morning at 8 fucking am I have my stats final (8am is waaaaaaaaaaay to fucking early for stats) then I work 3pm to 7pm.  And friday I work 3pm-7pm. And sometime this week before Friday at 3pm I have to write a 10 fucking page paper for criminology.  Anyone want to write it for me?!?!?!?!?!?

I cant wait for this week to be over, I will be so much less stressed.  Oh and also during this busy week i need to squeeze in time to hang out with my friends and my boyfriend who i wont get to see for 3 weeks! Woe is me, but the money is good!!!!!!!!!!!  So yeah my life is pretty boring, I have been going to bed early and gettin up at 8am since friday adn that will be the latest I get to sleep on pretty much all week except for Wednesday :(  :(  :(  Too much stuff to do sucks!!!!!!

Um to my knowledge I am coming home Dec 22, that is not for sure though.  Hopefully I can cry adn make my daddy come pick me up instead of making me ride the bus..... UGH!!!!

You Are Mashed Potatoes
Oridnary, comforting, and more than a little predictable You're the glue that holds everyone together.
What Part of Thanksgiving Are You?
WOOOHOOOOOOOOOOOOOO I SAW GOBLET OF FIRE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Well this weekend was lots of fun!  I went home Friday morning adn luckily the pass really wasnt that bad.  Friday I didnt do a whole lot, hung out at home and helped parentals with a few little things, I did laundry, which dude, free laundry is bomb!  I am pay $2.50 to do one load, thats washer + dryer, and that is freaking expensive!!  I also made my mom a cake, cause her bday was thursday adn my dad didn't really do anything, and my bro couldnt even call home to say happy birthday... guys are lame. (well at least the ones in my family)  Yeah, so making the cake was a fiasco to say the least, but it all ended well, and I got cake and icecream..... yum!

Saturday was a bit more interesting Allison came over at like 11am, and hung out at my place for a few hours, we helped my dad make cinnamon roles, they turned out hella good!!  It was good to see her again, duh, haha.  Then her and I left my house around 3.  She really wanted me to see the new apt that she is moving into, so we hung out at her place for a bit then her, Dustin, adn I walked down to their new apt, its sooooooo nice looking, I am very envious of their washer and dryer!  After ogling(sp) their place we went back to their place and watched some Sex adn the City, and of course Allison had to practically fall asleep on the futon.... geez! J/k she had been up for almost 24 hrs, so it was understandable. By that time it was almost six, so Dustin drove me home cause I felt obligated to spend lots of time with parentals cause I hadnt seen them in 2 months, and my daddy misses me, and also I dunno the next time I will see them.

I have a job interview at safeway tomorrow at 3, you all have to think good thoughts for me!!!!  If I get this job though I am more than likely going to be here for turkey day and thanksgiving, so if I am you guys have to take pitty on me and send me some mashed potatoes, via mail, real ones only though, fake ones are nasty, hahahahahahaha.  I am hoping that I get this job cause I really need one, unless of course any of you guys really want to pay me for sexual favors during break, hahahahahaaa.  Yeah I know I am crazy!  I am hoping this interview goes really well, I am not nervous, but I rarely get nervous, its nice yet weird at the same time, I guess I just have an abundance of self cofindence, or some crap like that.  

Today was a good day, I had to get up too early, but that is usual at home, I have been pretty tired today, cause I got 18 hrs of sleep over 3 days, and that is not near enough for me!  I was so tired that I fell asleep in the car on friday cause I only had like 4 hrs of sleep, my friend told me at one point he looked over and my head was back and my mouth was wide open...... not hot... oh well at least I am not interested in him, cause that would just suck, and I didnt drool, lol.  Well back to today, I was able to get my mom to take me out and buy me some stuff, YAY! We went to old navy, and I got some really cute cords, very outa character for me cause I used to hate cords, they are really pretty, like a raspberry color. And I got 2 long sleeve tshirts, to where under my tshirts for extra layers cuase it gets hella cold here!!  I got a white one and gray one (yes I had to tell you that!)  Then we went to hot topic cause I wanted a patch for my jeans, they didnt have as many good ones as they usually do, I was disapointed, but I got a greenday one cause I like them, and it was cool looking so I got that, adn then a Harry Potter Goblet of fire shirt caught my eye adn I had to go check them out, adn convinced my mom to get me one, she was gonna save it for Christmas, but when we got home she said I could just take it with me now.  So that was very exciting.

Well I think its time to end this, cause its getting too long.  See you sluts later!

Well I just got back from the bars, it was lots of fun, as ususal, too freaking crowded though, since there is no class tomorrow.  I got to see my boy, yay, and dance with my girls, well mostly just Ali, but that was way fun!  I was D.D which was funny, drove the drunkies through Jack in the Crack, very humerous!

I am currently hella starving, so I am gonna make some tuna helper, cuase yeah, that sounds good, adn I didnt get anything at Jack, cause I am too poor!  And I am gonna buy an egg mcmuffin on the road tomorrow.  I have to pack and do dishes and eat tonight, before I go to bed, I am leaving at 9am tomorrow to go home, so I will be tired, but oh well, Well anywho time to go make tuna helper cause thats the shit!

After coming back from the bars and being starving, mac and cheese just hits the spot.  

I currently smell hella like cigarette smoke, ewwww

I can't wait till Jan 1 when no smoking is allowed in bars, YAY!

You are a Halloween cupcake! You are gooey and
sweet.

What Halloween Food are You?
brought to you by Quizilla

Well had yesterday was a fun day/night. I am no longer a beer pong virgin.  Its such a fun game, except for the beer part, but I am sooo gonna make Allison play it with me sometime, just wiht bitch beer instead of nasty cheap beer beer, cause beer is ucky!!! My team won, it was waaaaaaaaay awesome, my partner was waaaaaay better at it then me though, cause hes like a beer pong vet, but outa 10 cups I think I made 3 of them, and it was down to the last cup, and my partner got it in, and then it was my turn, and if I got it in that meant that they didnt get one more shot to throw it at our cups, and I MADE IT IN, IT WAS SOOOOO FUCKING AWESOME!!!!!!!  So yeah, last night was cool.  

I am currently hungry, but I dunno what I want, we dont have alot of food here, so yeah... dunno, I have cheesy tuna helper I could warm up but I dunno if I want to or not.  So yeah, well I think I am gonna go rummage around the kitchen, since all I have eaten today is a bowl of cereal.  Later sluts!


P.S. everyone needs to check out my myspace cause my background is hella awesome!!!!!!!!!!

Dude being 21 is so fucking awesome!  Went out to the bars tonight, with the coolest chicks around Lady Lindsay, and Alli.  Had tons of fun, met lots of cool people, and danced for hrs at the Oakrail.  Had a ton of fun.  The one downside, I got soooo freaking sweaty, like my hair was wet, ewwwwwwwwww, but I blame the sweaty guys I danced with, hahahahaha.  But I had fun getting my freak on, hahahah I love saying that, its so not me.  But yeah, lots of fun, lots of cute guys, and ran into a bunch of friends while we were out.  But now its time for me to mello down, adn then go to bed.  Later sluts!

P.S.  I did all this while sober, I only had a couple sips of Lindsays margarita thingy, and thats it, so HA! :-p

Well this weekend was nice, chill yet productive, and included tasty brownies, mmmm brownies.

Tests are lame!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I am so done with school, its sad.  

Getting up early is lame, I am now tired at 11:58pm, that is lame.

Being sick sucks, but at least I am starting to get better, about fucking time.

I am calling about a job tomorrow that is way lame, but money is money.

I like a guy in my class, maybe I will have to be extra flirty tomorrow.

School is sucky...............

Well not a whole ton is going on right now.  Went on Crystals 21 run on Wednesday night, that was fun.  Got lots of great pics!  I am still sick but getting better, I finally have antibiotics, YAY for drugs!!!!!  Got most of the apt cleaned up yesterday, going to tackle my room today, cause its a pit, shock shock for those of you that know me, lol.  School is going, lol, thats all I can say about that, I have had a couple tests so far, still dont have them graded yet.  My volunteering at the youth center for class is cool.  So yeah things are going, I cant wait till I am not sick, lol.  Well time to start cleaning my room.  Later sluts!

http://www.ironhymen.com/

To give you a preview, here is my fav quote from the site.   "To never let tampons violate the sanctity of my hoo-hoo, because tampons are really nothing more than thirsty little albino penises."


So yeah, check out the site, its way rad!  Its part of whitehouse.org, don't worry its not porn or anything

bah, I hate the health center.  Had to get up early which sucked cause its saturday, I didnt get to sleep past 9 all week, including today, lame.  And got there and the dr says nothings wrong with me adn thats its prob just alergies.  And I was all uhhh ok, even though it totally isn't because for the last 3 WEEKS I have been coughing, had a runny nose, tons of post nasal drip (YUCK!) and a scratchy throat, that is not alergies thank you very much.  It was practically a complete waste of my time, and she didnt even give me free sudaphed(sp) which they always do so that was sucky.  So yeah I am still stuck with this damn disease or whatever it is till my damn immune system can get off its ass and get rid of it.  Its very lame having an immune deficiency!!!!!!!! :(  Oh well, not much I can do about it.  I got my bike fixed finally! Its had a flat tire for like a week and a half, very lame, cause I couldnt ride it to class, duh! So I got it fixed today, also got some groceries at freddies, so I had a slightly productive day, I still have to do laundry, but right now I am hungry! so I think I am gonna cook dinner! Later!

I feel very blegh!  I am seriously sick of this damn cold that I have literally had for 3 fucking weeks.  I have an apt at the health center tomorrow since my body cant shake this damn sickness.  Its very annoying to have no fucking immune system, it gets real old real quick, believe me!  This weekend its gonna be way deserted on campus, it will be nice, not as noticable as if I were still living on campus, but still nice.  Tomorrow is Battle in Seattle, the big Western vs. CWU game over at Qwest Stadium, so thats where everyone is gonna be.  So yeah, bored with this so I am going to do something else...

Well I met with my advisor today.  I had to to make sure that I have all my shit together for graduation.  In 2 quarters I will be a college graduate, BOOYA BABY!!!! I am very excited if you couldnt tell, hahahaha.  I also found out the my advisor, one of my fav profs, is teaching one of the 5 required classes that I have left next quarter and I wasnt looking forward to taking this class and now I am, so yay.  Its weird that I only have 2 classes in my major and 3 in my minor that I have to take, but I need 32 total winter and spring for the 180 credits to graduate so I get to take a bunch of 300 level electives in my major and minor, it will be cool.  Well time to get some breakfast so I dont starve to death! LATER SLUTS!

Oh and I went out to the bars last night and had lots of fun dancing for an hr or so!

I'M A WHORE, I'M A WHORE, A DIRTY DIRTY WHORE *in singsong voice*... ahhhh one can dream...


I believe that I am going out to the bars again tonight, I CANT WAIT, WHEEEEEEEEEEEEEE


Lindsay is the best shore EVER for taking me out!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I am starving time for fooooooooooooooooooooood, or........... I will eat my arm off!!!!!







...am I crazy?....

Bah! Its raining again, it rained on friday as well, I dont like the rain!  I thought by coming over to the eastside I was gonna escape it :( :(  Not much is going on currently.  I am really glad that its the weekend, it was nice to chill and stuff, spent most of the time inside cause its soooooooo freaking freezing outside!!!!! It feels like November, not October!  Finally turned the heat on in our place, its been off up until like 10 mins ago.  Umm I am gonna eat some leftover potpie soon and then go over to Jasons and watch charmed on his tv while he is over here, cause its the best show ever!!!!!!  Well I've run outa things to say, so, Later sluts!

Well the current love my life is Jason, because he got my computer hooked up to the internet, damn I have missed it so, lol.  Not a whole ton going on in my life, I mean I guess a lot of stuff has happened since I last updated but none of it was life altering such as, I found Jesus (not gonna happen, btw).  

Being back in eburg is great, I missed all my friends.  My new apt is freaking AWESOME!! I am soo glad I am living off campus, and I love rooming with Monica, we are crazy but we make work, our current thing right now is watching the neighbors casue we are freaks, but they are crazy!! And we named the maintenence guy Juan the gardener, haha we are mean, don't ever get on our bad side cause we will come up with a mean nickname, bwahahaha.  

Last night and tonight were a lot of fun.  I got to go out to the bars both nights with Lindsay, and damn I was HOT!yeah you wish you were there so you could all drool all over my hot ass! ;)  Last night we went to the Starlight which was freaking crowded but you just chill and drink so thats cool (and for the record I drank water only) and then we went to the oakrail, and danced for 2 hrs.  Yes I danced the whole time it was loads of fun, I was surprised I was able to do it sober, and for those of you who saw me on my 21 run, no judging, cause I looked better this time, lol.  The guys there apparently thought I was hot since I got a few wanting to dance with me and one particular one I wanted to jump his bones, but I won't kiss and tell ;) So yeah it was a ton of fun!

Tonight was also fun, we met up with some of Lindsays friends at the Starlight, the boys crack me up, they are so funny and random.  After doing that for awhile we went to the Oakrail (and again I did not drink anything but water) wasnt really in the mood to dance tonight, so I just chatted with some guys, and that was cool, I did however get asked to dance like 4 times.  Saw one of my old profs there, I am like totally in love with him in an a-sexual way if that makes sense, hes to old for me though, like 40's, and if I had been in a dancing mood, I totally woulda had him dance with me cause he is way bomb. 

Well I am hungry so I think its time to make and english muffin and eat it, YUM!

Later sluts!

Well we finally have internet, about fucking time.  I am still alive.  We cant get it on my computer for a couple days cause we dont have power for the router, but I can check stuff on monicas computer, just wanted people to know I am still here and doing fine.

Well its getting closer and closer to my move in date.  I am very excited and cant wait.  We are driving over saturday morning in a uhaul filled with all my crap.  My parents have been fighting alot lately, my dad can't figure out how not to be an ass, so thats annoying, oh well.  Sunday could very well be hellish, havent figured out if we are going to my grandmas for her bday, if we do, it will be hell!  Oh well.  Well just felt like doing a quick update. Later sluts!

You Know You're Addicted to LiveJournal When...
If you can't access the site, you have a minor freak out - and a major case of hitting reload. You found yourself composing journal entries during dates, movies, even sex! When you're out, you suddenly think of a witty reply to a comment somebody made to you... several days ago. You actually call it LJ and not Livejournal. Check. You've downloaded some sort of LJ program which has only the purpose of making entries easier to write without going on the site manually. You consider it a great offense if someone deletes you off their friend's list. The first thing you do every day when you go online is check your friends journals - even before checking your email. You actually paid money for a few extra pictures with a full account when you could actually just alternate pics when you want to for your screen icons. When your friends ask what's new, you get mad at them because you already wrote it in your LJ and they didn't check it yet. You have put more time into LJ than all your assignments for the semester. You have more friends on LJ than in real life. You've met at laest 50% of your LJ friends. You can't seem to call your friends by their real names - only LJ names will do. You've fallen in love with someone you met on LJ. You have posted about a party or get together on your LJ... and random strangers showed up. You are guilty of traveling more than an hour to meet someone with LiveJournal. (Extra points for traveling five hours or more) You've written a protected entry about one of your LiveJournal friends. (Extra points if they eventually found out about it) You have written posts to notify people you're going to sleep. You talk about your LJ friends to your real life friends all the time... like they're a part of your group. You've created a LJ community, and people actually post in it. You've been recognized in real live by a fellow LJ'er. You have friended someone because of their LiveJournal icon. You have "pity friends" on your list, who you would defriend if you could. You've pimped one of your friends on journal, trying to get people to friend him / her. Instead of doing research, you post difficult questions on your LiveJournal. Your pets all have their own LiveJournals. You know, right now, how many people have friended you (without peeking). You've stopped being friends with someone in real life because of something they've said on LJ. You're guilty of posting sexy or nude pictures to get more people to friend you. You have consoled yourself after a horrible day thinking "At least this will make a great LJ post" You're jealous of people who have more friends and / or comments than you. You have written a really great, solid post - only to be disappointed by the lack of good comments. You're guilty of commenting excessively to get more traffic to your journal. You've deleted a post a few minutes (or hours) after you've written it, because it seemed lame in retro spect. You give shout outs to all your LJ friends on their birthdays. You have an additional, secret journal that hardly anyone knows about. You've broken up with someone - or ended a friendship - soley via LiveJournal. You have gotten mean anonymous comments (bonus points for figuring out who it was via their IP) You've been reported (or reported someone) to LJ Abuse. You've been featured on LJ Drama. You actually get these jokes and pass them on to other friends who are LJ addicts.


Get Your Own Addicted Meme Here

Well I am back from eburg.  It was windy, as usual.  My apt is very nice, on the 2nd floor, first would have been preferable but I dont mind being on the 2nd.  Brought over a ton of my stuff. All I have left to take over is furniture, books, electronics, and the stuff I am using now like my bathroom stuff.  It was nice being back in eburg, good old eburg, I miss it, didn't get to see as many people as I wanted but come Sept 10, I can see all my friends again, yay!  Well time to go do dishes or something like that, I did pretty much jack shit yesterdy so today I told my mom I would vacuum and clean the house for her.  Later sluts!

Well it looks like tomorrow if all goes according to plan I am going to eburg tomorrow with my mom, since it obviously didnt work on Friday, stupid van, grrrrrrrr. But the good news is that we don't have to worry about the van dieing any more, cause on saturday we got a new car, yayayay! This is very unheard of for my parents, it takes my dad forever, I mean forever to decide anything, and yet we have a new car. Its a 2005 honda pilot. this is what it looks like Its really nice. Its awesome that we finally have a car that has a stereo thats not fucking retarded, and it has a cd player (very exciting for me, lol) So yeah going to eburg to dump a load of stuff. I am very excited, cause its about fucking time. Well gotta go dump the compost for my dad, EWWWW!!!!

Well as everyone knows I was headed off to eburg today.  I got up early and my mom and I packed the car all up with stuff to take to my apt, and we started out ok, but almost to the top of the pass that car started acting up, it wouldnt shift into overdrive, so we were going barely 60 with the pedal to the floor.  So yeah lots of time was spent waiting and hoping it would cool down and be fine, that didnt work, so we ended up having to call a tow truck and get towed all the way back to Oly.  That was waaaaaay lame and expensive!!!!! $439!! OUCH!  so yeah, not the day I intended to have, I was super pumped that I was gonna see eburg and my apt today I didnt get to go :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :( :(

The only good thing is that this seems to have finally convinced my dad that we need a new car, the van is a totaly piece of shit, the transmission has been rebuilt twice, so hopefully *crosses fingers* we will get rid of it, my parents went up to puyallup(sp) and look at the Toyota dealer and tomrorrow we are going to Fife to the Honda deal. So yeah.

Well just a quick update then off to bed for me, cause i haev to get up at like 6am, ew!  You guys should check out my myspace, I added a pic, and changed my profile and such.  I am leaving tomorrow morning early to drop stuff off in eburg, not sure if we are spending the night.  at the very lastest I will be back sat afternoon.  My move in date is official (honestly cant remember if I said this already) but its Sept 10 (ah damn, it just hit me, thats my parents aniversary and they get to move me in that day, oopsy I feel bad now, oh well).  Well bed for me, LATER SLUTS!

Well I am leaving for eburg on fri.  Don't cry, its not for good.  My mom adn I are going to haul a load of stuff over there, i am very excited to see my new place!!!!!! Well I think Part one is finally how I want it so here it is again. Part 2 I am still tweaking with so I wont put it in here just yet, if you really wanna read it go look in my previous entry.

 

 

It was unusual weather for August. The rain poured off the gutter occasionally splattering my window. It was dark, surprising for 8pm. The sign on the door said closed, but my partner and I were still in the office, waiting for the mysterious man on the telephone to show up at the preasigned time of 9:30, bringing with him the half million he offered and a job for us. Times were lean so half million up front was like tuna in front of a cat, we couldn't resist, especially since he offered another half mill if we completed the job to his liking.
Who am I you wonder?  The sign on the door says it all.  M and Spike Private Eyes.  Sounds like a glamerous job but it really isn't.  Alot of spouses hire us to see if they other spouse is cheating as well as lots of late nights holed up in my '89 piece of shit, buick lesabre, freezing in the winter, boiling in the summer, watching and waiting with cameras poised.
At first glance we don't look like much, to the untrained eye we seem at most a very boring married couple.  Spike, looking more like an accountant than anything, was nicknamed thus for his quickness with a vicious 6 inch railroad spike, sharpened to a deadly point and  more effective than a switchblade. Equally as nerdy as Spike (however I would not be caught dead wearing a sweater vest) I would fit in very well at a young librarians' conference, minus the scary glasses.  Instead I carry an equally scary .357 magnum desert eagle, tucked in the small of my back. I have a tendency to use the gun first and ask questions later

Deep in my thoughts the loud knock at the door took a second to penetrate my brain, I dropped my feet sharply from my desk where they had been resting, causing a loud thud against the battered wood floor.  My orange cat Bogart, startled by the noises, ran across the room making Spike cuss as he nearly tripped over the cat in an attempt to open the door. Years of being a detective made me accustumed to weirdness and oddities, but I almost was unable to make my face devoid of expression at the site of our visitor. 
He looked about 90, but his voice put him more at 70. His face was terribly disfigured, the left side hardly resembled a face at all, an eyepatch covered where his eye has once been, and the flesh seemed to hang off his face in the areas that weren't ravenged by scar tissue. He was dressd all in black with a cloak around his shoulders, circa 1800's, a bit old fashioned for me, but he was going to pay half mill and it wasn't for me to comment on his wardrobe choice.

He introduced himself as Mr Smith, the name we knew to be fake immediatly, Spike shooting me a look across the room, but we decided to let him tell us his story. What he was about to tell us for the next half hour, would change our lives forever, but we were too reckless and poor to care.

So I had to edit part one cause there were spots that the wording was bugging me.  So heres part one adn some of part 2, enjoy.

Oh and I need a bad guy bad ass gangsta' person.  So if you would like to be that person, or have a good name for the part let me know asap!!!!



It was unusual weather for August. The rain poured off the gutter occasionally splattering my window. It was dark, surprising for 8pm. The sign on the door said closed, but my partner and I were still in the office, waiting for the mysterious man on the telephone to show up at the preasigned time of 9:30, bringing with him the half million he offered and a job for us. Times were lean so half million up front was like tuna in front of a cat, we couldn't resist, especially since he offered another half mill if we completed the job to his liking.

Who am I you wonder?  The sign on the door says it all.  M and Spike Private Eyes.  Sounds like a glamerous job but it really isn't.  Alot of spouses hire us to see if the other spouse is cheating as well as lots of late nights holed up in my '89 piece of shit, honda, freezing in the winter, boiling in the summer, watching and waiting with cameras poised.

At first glance we don't look like much, which is part of the secret to our success, people don't think we are detectives and open up to us much easier.  Spike, looking more like an accountan than anything, was nicknamed thus for his quickness with a vicious 6 inch railroad spike, sharpened to a deadly point and  more effective then a switchblade.  Now you are probably curious as to what I look like, well think older college kid. Carrying instead of books my trusty .357 magnum desert eagle, tucked in the small of my back with silencer of course, a weapon that I have a tendency to use first and ask questions later.

Deep in my thoughts the loud knock at the door took a second to penetrate my brain, I dropped my feet sharply from my desk where they had been resting, causing a loud thud against the battered wood floor.  My orange cat Bogart, startled by the noises, ran across the room making Spike cuss as he nearly tripped over the cat in an attempt to open the door. Years of being a detective made me accustumed to weirdness and oddities, but I almost was unable to make my face devoid of expression at the site of our visitor.  He looked about 70, but his voice put him more at 50. His face was terribly disfigured, the left side hardly resembled a face at all, an eyepatch covered where his eye has once been, and the flesh seemed to hang off his face in the areas that weren't ravenged by scar tissue. He was dressd all in black with a cloak around his shoulders, circa 1800's, a bit old fashioned for me, but he was going to pay half mill and it wasn't for me to comment on his wardrobe choice. 

He introduced himself as Mr Smith, the name we knew to be fake immediatly, Spike shooting me a look across the room, but we decided to let him tell us his story. What he was about to tell us for the next half hour, would change our lives forever, but we were too reckless and poor to care.
"My name is Mr. Smith.  For now all dealings will be through me, but you may eventually meet my boss Blondie.  She is a force  to be reckoned with so any thought of betrayl or double crossing should instantly be erassed from your minds.  However that is not the issue here, your reputation of being honest proceeds you, and if I had any doubt in you I would not be here now.  I am now going to tell you why I am here.  My story centers around an exquisite diamond, as most stories do.  This isn't just any diamond, it is the worlds largest diamond, it has spent so little time in public that almost  no one has heard of it.  Originally named the Elizabethan Diamond, after the Queen who owned it, it is now know as the Blood diamond because of all the blood that has been shed in efforts to get it. Rumor has it that if you hold it outside under the light of the full moon the cursed (for it is believed to be cursed) diamond shines a brilliant red, the red of all that bloodshed. This of course is a rumor and I myself do not believe it.  
This diamond is what I want you to get for me.  It was, legally, owned by my boss Blondie, and it dissapeared 10 years ago.  At the time we searched fruitlessly for it to no avail, but about a month ago rumor has it that the diamond is back in the area."
"Wait," said Spike "Isn't that stupid of them to bring the diamond back to the area?"
"It is, but we believe that due to much double crossing the diamond has passed through several owners in the last 10 years, and Letworth is a city known for its huge jewelry black market, so it has drawn the theives back here, not knowing that it came from here originally."

I am about to write a quick short story.  I dedicate it to dustin, because if he and I hadn't been discusing falling into toilets via aim, the idea for this story would have never come to me.

This story is supposed to be like the film noirs from the '30s, think Humphrey Bogart (if you dont know who that is, something is wrong with you and you better this instant go out and rent Casablanca!!!!)


It was unusual weather for August.  The rain poured off the gutter occasionally splattering my window.  It was dark, surprising for 8pm.  The sign on the door said closed, but my partner and I were still in the office, waiting for the mysterious man on the telephone to show up at the preasigned time of 9:30, bringing with him the half million he offered and a job for us.  Times were lean so half million up front was like tuna in front of a cat, we couldn't resist, especially since he offered another half mill if we completed it to his likely.

Who am I you wonder?  Some criminal about to pull a heist?  Just the opposite in fact, my partner and I are detectives.  Sounds glamerous, but its not.  I am M and my partner is Spike, nicknamed that for his quickness with a vicious 6 inch railroad spike, sharpened to a deadly point and more effective then a switchblade.  This talent has come in handy several times when he has saved my ass.  Although Spike has saved my ass on occasion, I have a reputaion for shooting first and asking questions later with my favorite .357 magnum desert eagle with silencer, of course.  

There was aloud knock on the door interupting my thoughts and making me tilt my chair forward and thump my feet on the floor.  My orange cat Bogart ran across the room startled by these noises, making Spike cuss as he almost tripped over the cat in an attempt to open the door.  If years of being a detective hadn't made my face impassive to strangness my mouth would have dropped at the sight of our visitor.  He looked about 70, but his voice put him more at 50.  His face was terribly disfigured, the left side hardly resembled a face at  all, an eyepatch covered where his eye has once been, and the flesh seemed to hang off his face in the areas that weren't ravenged by scar tissue.  He was dressd all in black with a cloak around his shoulders, a bit old fashioned, circa 1800s for me, but he was going to pay half mill and it wasn't for me to comment on his wardrobe choice. 

He introduced himself as Mr Smith, the name we knew to be fake immediatly, Spike shooting me a look across the room, but we decided to let him tell us his story.  What he was about to tell us for the next half hour, would change our lives forever, but we were too reckless and poor to care.

So ends part one.  tell me if its crap, but be nice :-p

Well lately I have felt not at all any interest in doing a real lj update (yeah i know the wording of that sentence is odd).  

My bday was good.  Jen was way cool and picked me up for my bday.  We met up with Jeff, Nikki, and Shane at a bar called Frankies.  that was lots of fun!!! As you all theoretically saw in a previous lj update comment, i drank a lot (well at least for me) it left me very drunk!  I think we left at like 1 something, and Jen was cool and drove me to top so I could say hi to allison.  that was amusing to say the least, I was very apparantly drunk, I think it was very entertaining to allison, even (or especially) when I like fell on the floor right in front of her, lol.  Luckily we had perfect timing she got to go on break right after we got there, so we got to chat and she helped jen walk me to the car, be the bathering idiot that I am even sober, I kept saying that i was drunk, but yet very practical and pragmatic, and then went on to ask what pragmatic meant, yeah yeah I know I am retarded.  After that jen drove me home, my family was gone so that was nice, I stumbled in the door, walked down the stairs and proceded to fall on my ass on them, I was damn lucky I didnt fall down the stairs lol.  I searched for my cell phone charger, that was interesting, finally found it, and plugged cell phone in, that was a must since I was leaving for 3 days the next day.  

Managed to get into pjs and take contacts out, adn grab a bottle of water adn put it by my bed.  And then cause I felt like I might puke I sat on the floor by the toilet.  Ended up falling asleep with my head on the toilet, I have no freaking idea how long I was out for, coulda been 20 mins, coulda been 3 hrs, woke up and stumbled to bed.

Allison called and woke me up at like 7am and said she was coming over, so I stumbled my ass upstairs unlocked the door adn went back to bed, she came over about 8ish and we both proceded to try sleep, me cuase hell I was tired and didnt get much sleep the night before and her cuase she just got off work.  

My hangover proceded to hit me at about 8:30am, ew!  That is when the puking started, it was gross, I proceded to puke 6 times between 8:30 and noon, sleeping in between when I could till 11 when i got up to take a shower, that was hard, it between deciding to shower, showering, getting contacts in and combing out hair it took an hr, most of that was me sitting on the couch groaning adn thinking that I really need to get my ass in gear and put in contacts.  

The timing of my hangover(monday, in case anyone was confused) was shitty!! Because Allison, Brie and I, had plans to leave Monday for a 3 day camping trip for my bday.  and we had a lot of shit to get together Monday, especially me since I hadnt done any packing.  

I am deffinitly indebted to Allison and Brie, brie for not hating me as she had to get alot of the food stuff together, without me, and Allison cause she was nice while I was puking, got the puke bucket for me, and even packed my stuff while I sat in bed groaning that I wanted to die.  

We finally got all the stuff together, much later than anticipated, mostly due to my very comatose state.  Left town at like 4pm, adn I had anticipated leaving at noon, hahaha, then again I hadnt anticipated on being hungover.

Went to ocean shores for camping.  that was a lot of fun.  we had a sweet campsite, not to close to people or the bathroom, but not so far that I had to walk a mile to pee.

One of the most fun parts of the trip was riding mopeds, none of us had done if before so we decided to give it a shot, omg it is sooooooooooooooooo much fun.  we ended up riding for 3 hrs, 2 hrs straight on Tuesday and then an hr on Wed.  So yeah that was waaaaaaaaaaay bomb!!!!

One last thing and then I am done.  Because of my hangover i am on a no alcohol kick, it just makes my stomach go ewwww thinking about it, it will be interesting to see how long this lasts, I know it wont be forever.  

But now its time for me to go to bed, I am tired, I worked my ass off all day painting the side of the house, and I havent gotten much sleep the last few days. later sluts!

I am back from the ocean, had a bomb time, when I have energy and time I will tell all.  Now its time for bed casue I am tired!
